---
title: "Get multiclass lncRNAs"
output: html_notebook
---

A small script to save a text file of the multiclass lncRNAs.
```{r}
# read in multiclass genes
genes <- read.table('../../mapping_to_genes/gene_lists/genes__1500.csv', sep = ',', header = TRUE)

# now load in their gene type
source('../ensembl_id_to_something_else.R')
genes_types <- ensembl_to_simpler(genes$ensembl_gene_id, 'gene_biotype', remove_duplicates = FALSE)

# and add to genes
genes <- merge(genes, genes_types, by = 'ensembl_gene_id', all.x = TRUE, all.y = FALSE, sort = FALSE)
genes <- distinct(genes)

# only keep lncRNAs
lncRNAs <- genes[genes$gene_biotype == 'lncRNA', ]

# save as names
write.table(lncRNAs$gene_name, 'multiclass_lncRNAs.txt', row.names = FALSE, col.names = FALSE, quote = FALSE)
```
